R0101.title: Intentional Feeding
R0101.definition: A player intentionally or through deliberate misplay causes their game character to be killed by an opponent, giving the opponent a kill (known as a 'feed').
R0101.description: Intentional feeding directly affects game outcomes. In MOBA games, each kill grants the killer experience and gold, so feeding makes opponents stronger and undermines team combat effectiveness. It also negatively impacts other players' experience by causing game imbalance and making the game significantly harder for teammates.
R0101.influence: Affects game fairness and other players' experience.
